meanings.definition: The act of stealing small items, especially in a sneaky way.
meanings.sent1: The pilferage of candies from the jar went unnoticed.
meanings.sent2: The store owner discovered the pilferage of pens from the stationery section.
meanings.sent3: The pilferage of cookies from the cookie jar left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her pilferage of time during work hours was like a silent thief in the night.
meanings.sent5: The pilferage of coins from the fountain brought bad luck to the town.
